title: iMac 820-2733-A
message: Simply, does not wake from sleep. Must be hard reset. I have no idea at all with iMacs... Anyone please?

title: iMac 820-2733-A
message: Could be anything. GPU is the most common issue on these. If it is anything else it is pretty hopeless. See if all hardware is present and working, camera/card reader/usb, etc. See if ASD picks up anything.
